description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.en:
By the time he opened his eyes, Kubota Tamotsu (34 years old) has been reincarnated into another world. Moreover, as a 6 years old slave with “Level 1 Barrier” skill. To surpass his limitations and become a powerful Barrier master Kubota begins a hellish training, full of obstacles and struggles. — From “Let’s Become a Novelist”, a new other world fantasy starts!  
  
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3631do/)  
[Light Novel](https://bookwalker.jp/series/130407/)
description.ja: ブラック企業で働く久保たもつ(34歳)は、ふと目が覚めると「結界師」としてのスキルを持つ奴隷(6歳)として異世界に転生していた。わけがわからないまま、奴隷市で売れ残り、処分されかける直前、バーサーム侯爵家に拾われる。専属の結界師「リノス」として育てられることになり、日々結界師としての才能を開花させていくリノス。次から次に降りかかってくる厄介ごとに翻弄されながら、今日も全力で奮闘するのであった――。
description.pt-br: Kubota Tamotsu um trabalhador de 34 anos desmaia depois de descobrir que sua equipe se demitiu e ele não poderá cumprir o prazo de entrega, quando ele abre os olhos ele está em um outro mundo, confuso ele descobre que reencarnou como um escravo de 6 anos com uma habilidade de Barreira Level 1. Para superar suas limitações e se tornar um poderoso mestre de barreiras, Kubota começa um treinamento infernal, cheio de obstáculos e lutas.Uma nova fantasia começa!

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.vi: Những nàng lọ lem ngọt ngào của tiệm bánh

description.en: "I want my little sister to eat a cake!" Minori, a male college student, decided to work part-time at a super popular cake shop with that in mind. The shop is located inside a school for young ladies!? Can a boy bad at communicating, who can't even look straight in the eye and speak properly run a cake shop with four JK patissiers? Enjoy a teen romantic comedy sweeter than a cake♪
description.ja:
妹にケーキを食べさせたい！」その一心で超人気洋菓子店でのバイトを始めることに決めた男子大学生のみのり。しかしその店があるのはなんと“お嬢様学校の中”！？　まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障男子がJKパティシエ4人とともにお店を切り盛りできるのか？　ケーキよりも甘～い青春ラブコメをご賞味あれ!

まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障大学生の季村みのり。妹にケーキを食べさせたい一心で超人気洋菓子店でバイトに応募したがそこはなんとお嬢様学校の構内にある店だった！　春宮苺、夏野もも、秋山林檎、冬月みかん、４人のJKパティシエと一緒にお店を切り盛りすることに!?

title.ja: Clevatess - Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha

altTitles.en: Clevatess - The King of Devil Beasts, the Baby, and the Brave of the Undead

altTitles.ja: クレバテス−魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者−

altTitles.pt-br: Clevatess - O Rei das Feras Diabólicas, O bebê e a Valente Heróina Morta-Viva

description.en:
It killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…
Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the king of the devil beasts.
Angered by the 13 heroes tasked to take his life, he decided to bring ruin on mankind but get entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.
Is it the tale of a near-ending world close to the apocalypse or the diary of new era childcare?
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

description.en:
A collection of short stories about the everyday lives of girls who have trouble with the people around them.

---

The first volume contains stories about...
- A lonely woman who works part-time, and who has crippling social anxiety that leads to misunderstandings.
- A girl who is 'dumped' by her close friend.
- A single mother who struggles to understand how to make her daughter happy.
- A girl who desperately wants to buy a dress that she thinks could change her life.
... and many more!

(Source: MangaHelpers)

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.de:
Da geht irgendwas sehr seltsames in der Nachbarschaft vor sich.  
Ja wen wirst du Bescheid sage? Wen willst du zur Hilfe holen? Ähm… irgendein komisches… Mädchen was von sich behauptet, hypnotische Kräfte zu besitzen? Ach so, ja, genau das.  
Jedoch hast du absolut keine Ahnung wo sie ist, und du hast ihr auch nicht Bescheid gegeben.  
Was wird nun aus dir werden, da er da ist…?
description.en:
There's something strange, in the neighborhood.  
Who you gonna call? Uhm. Some strange cute hypnotist girl.  
And you have no clue who she is, and you didn't call her.  
  


---
description.ru:
Каково это, когда привычный мир рушится в одночасье? Кто друг, а кто враг?
Можно ли доверять себе, когда сам теряешься в круговороте пугающих и необъяснимых событий? А может быть, ты сам и есть их источник?
Главный герой — обычный корейский парень, живущий с пожилой матерью в крохотной квартирке, обнаружил, что люди вокруг внезапно изменились. Некие зловещие существа без лишнего шума захватили целый город, а, возможно, даже страну или мир. Но главный герой не собирается сидеть сложа руки и, объединившись с загадочной гипнотизёршей, решает дать отпор неведомым тварям.

description.en: After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.
description.uk: Будучи маріонеткою своєї прийомної матері, Саї ніколи не була вільною. Вона була безсила дати відсіч і перебувала у владі інших. Після переродження вона вирішує все це змінити.

description.en:
Eunho, the strongest in the yokai realm!
He gained the chance to become a human being after losing the woman he loved and killing countless yokai.
After passing the gate of reincarnation by accumulating merit for a thousand years to abandon his immortal body…

He became a human being, held a sword, and learned martial arts for the first time.
But this is very… easy?

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.en: A "police box" drama that peeks into the daily life of police officers...

altTitles.en: Catch Me When the Skylarks Sing
Please Catch Me When I Hear the Lark Singing

altTitles.ja-ro: ひばりが鳴いたらつかまえて

altTitles.zh: 雲雀鳴叫之時 便是捕捉之際

description.en:
"In order to meet you, I…"  
  
Enomoto, currently a college student, often finds himself reminiscing the days spent with his childhood friend Shimura, who had always been beside him up until six years ago. Due to a sudden transfer, Enomoto didn't get to ask Shimura where he was moving and he hadn't heard anything from him since.  
  
Until one day, he suddenly reunites with Shimura in his Philosophy class in college. Enomoto is over the moon, but Shimura seems to feel differently…

In a world where Humans and Demons are in constant wars. Human adventurers seek to challenge the demon tower, home of the demons, which boast over a hundred floors, thousands of strong demons and generals. and at the top of towers lair the mightiest demon lord.   
All adventurers seek to take the demon lord’s head to ends the never ending war and restore peace to mandkind. However, a young mage girl wishes to take her hand and propose her.  
  
* [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/Color_LES)
description.pt-br: Aventureiros tentam conseguir a cabeça da rainha demônio, mas uma jovem maga apaixonada deseja ter a mão dela. Junte-se a nós, por este conto obscuro de amor e persistência ambientado em um RPG da vida real.

altTitles.ja: 超エリートな新米パパ

altTitles.en: Xiao Bai's Father Is a Wonderful Person

description.en: Because of a conspiracy, she got pregnant and gave birth to a cute little darling. A few years later, she met her “sweetheart” again. Only, the cold, unfeeling man from the legends didn’t seem as bad as she had imagined?
The young president of the Dibicci bank, Lawrence Dibicci, controls the economic world of the Cosimo Empire. One day, a girl named Rahui is thrown under his wings instead of her father's debt.

altTitles.zh-ro: Sanguozhi Qunxiongzhuan: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

altTitles.zh-hk: 三国志群雄伝火鳳燎原

altTitles.de: The Ravages of Time: Die Geschichte der Drei Reiche

description.en:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

title.en: Your Turn to Chase After Me

altTitles.en: Pampered Wife of a Warm Marriage

description.en:
Mo Shiyi's dreamed to marry a tall, rich, and handsome man and strived to reach the top in life. However, before her rebirth, she unexpectedly loved a man so much to the extent of losing her herself and was bullied and lost her son. Hence after rebirth, Mo Shiyi was occupied with taking revenge! In her past life she had vowed to burn him and scatter his ashes, but in this life she helped that scum and even offered to warm his bed? 

Mo Shiyi sneered coldly. “Sorry, I just wanted to divorce you.”
description.zh: 才华横溢的莫诗意最大的梦想是迎娶高富帅，走上人生巅峰。可谁又知道，重生前的莫诗意爱他爱到没了自我，最后却落得个人人欺压、丧子身死的下场。于是，重生后的莫诗意忙着复仇！明明上一世恨不得将她挫骨扬灰，这一世不仅在第一时间帮她虐渣立威，更是自荐为她暖床？莫诗意呵呵冷笑，不好意思，本小姐如今只想跟你离婚。

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

“I’ve clearly told you—I’m just an ordinary B0-class guide.” With a top-tier dual bloodline ability, Lee Yeoni lives and works in the countryside, keeping his looks and skills a secret. However, due to certain circumstances, he’s reassigned to the capital and becomes entangled with Tae Hajin, an S+ level esper. This sets off an unspoken power struggle between them.
Tae Hajin, who is suspicious of Lee Yeoni, senses he’s concealing something and is intent on uncovering the truth. Lee Yeoni tries to thwart Tae Hajin’s efforts to expose him, but it proves challenging. To protect himself, he decides to use Tae Hajin as a shield and takes on the role of his personal guide.

Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
description.es-la: No me puedo creer que mi Ojou-sama sea tan grande! Fujido Oriko es la exuberante hija del Conglomerado Fujido, un grupo que tiene un monopolio de la industria de máquinas expendedoras en Japón. Y a su lado está su mayordomo personal, el excéntrico Dr. Sebastian. Cuando un monstruo ataca de repente la ciudad, el Dr. Sebastian le da a su ojou-sama una bebida experimental que su equipo de I+D había estado desarrollando. Como resultado, ella crece hasta convertirse en una giganta! Será capaz de aplacar la ira de los invasores o, al menos, mantener intacta su dignidad?

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

title.en: Tough Gaiden - The Man Who Succeeds the Dragon

altTitles.en: The Man Who Succeeds The Dragon

altTitles.ja-ro: Tough Gaiden - Ryuu o Tsugu Otoko
Tough Gaiden - Ryuu wo Tsugu Otoko

description.en: The series starring one of illegitimate children of Kiryu Miyazawa, Ryuusei Nakamura. Years after Kiibo founded the new dojo, both him and Kiryu mysteriously disappeared. Ryuusei, after losing his mother to cancer, is set to find out about his birth father and his destiny as the evil dragon’s heir, but he is not the only one.
description.ru:
Третья часть саги Саруватари Тэцуи во вселенной "Жесткого". Что произошло после окончания второй части? Куда подевались некоторые старые герои? Где Киичи?  
Ответ на эти и множество других вопросов вы узнаете, начав читать "Жесткий: Наследник Дракона"!

title.en: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen shite Yatta

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染彼女のモラハラがひどいんで絶縁宣言してやった 〜自分らしく生きることにしたら、なぜか隣の席の隠れ美少女から告白された〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen Shite Yatta ~Jibun Rashiku Ikiru Koto ni Shitara, Naze ka Tonari no Seki no Kakure Bishoujo kara Kokuhaku Sareta~

altTitles.en: I’m Sick and Tired of My Childhood Friend’s, Now Girlfriend’s, Constant Abuse so I Broke up With Her
I Dared Declare Goodbye To My Emotionally Abusive Childhood Sweetheart

altTitles.vi: Quá mệt mỏi với việc bị con bạn thuở nhỏ kiêm bạn gái bắt nạt, tôi đã chia tay với em ấy

description.en:
My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can’t take it anymore.

So I’m left with no choice, I’m going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, it’s the only option.

And thus, the story of my break up begins…
description.pt-br: Minha amiga de infância também é minha namorada. Um sonho realizado, certo? De jeito nenhum, ela me insulta diariamente, ela destrói minha dignidade e isso afeta meu bem-estar mental, não aguento mais. Então não tenho escolha, terminarei com ela. Para manter minha sanidade, é a única opção.

description.en:
Controlling the Queendom of Sevek’s female prison with the Power of the Kraken!

From the author of Akame ga Kill and Mato Seihei no Slave!
description.id: Shimizu Kuuma, seorang laki-laki, yang baru saja kembali dari wawancara kerja yang tidak bisa dia selesaikan, tiba-tiba dikirim ke dunia lain, di sana dia bertemu dengan seorang gadis tertentu yang membantunya dan memberinya pekerjaan di penjara tetapi yang tidak dia ketahui adalah bahwa ini hanya jebakan untuk membawanya dan agar dia bisa 'dinikmati' oleh Bosnya, kemudian setelah dia dibantai dan dibuang ke laut dan hampir mati dia diselamatkan oleh Kraken yang menceritakan kisahnya tentang bagaimana Dia diselamatkan oleh seorang gadis tertentu yang adalah seorang tahanan, jadi mereka membuat kesepakatan, kemudian dia menyelamatkan gadis itu dan melakukan Pembalasan.
description.es-la: Shimizu Kuuma es un chico que siempre devuelve los favores. Un día, al regresar de una entrevista de trabajo fallida, es repentinamente transportado a otro mundo. En este mundo es salvado por una chica, quien le ofrece un trabajo como guardia de una prisión de mujeres. Sin pensarlo dos veces, Kuuma acepta, pero no se imaginó, que sería casi asesinado por una prisionera. Ellas tiran su cuerpo al mar, pero antes de morir, la criatura más fuerte del mar, el Kraken, lo salva y le ofrece fusionarse con él a cambio de algo. Es así como Kuuma sobrevive, consigue los poderes del Kraken y está dispuesto a tomar el control de la prisión para devolverle el favor al Kraken.

description.en: Hone's Dounjinshi about the grow of Team Rabbit and her captain Azusa

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий.

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

altTitles.tr: Seraph of the End: Kıyamet Meleği

altTitles.pl: Seraph of the End: Serafin Dni Ostatnich

altTitles.en: Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign

description.en: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
description.ru:
В стремлении к запретным знаниям «человек разумный» опять напортачил — в 2012 году на волю вырвался смертельный вирус, начавший косить человечество. Умирали почему-то взрослые, и тут, откуда ни возьмись, явились вампиры и согнали оставшихся детей в свой подземный город, объявив, что отныне «людишки» будут жить под защитой клыкастых хозяев, расплачиваясь кровью. Резкий парень Юитиро пожил так 4 года и понял, что пора валить — вместе с названным братом Микой и всей «семьей Хьякуя», группой детей, выросшей в одном приюте. Конечно, вампиры легко догнали и перебили беглецов, ушел лишь один.   
Выйдя на поверхность, юный Хьякуя понял, что эпидемия кончилась, но мир изменился — кругом разруха, бродят демоны, а кровососы потихоньку расширяют территорию, предлагая жителям «крышу». Власть в Японии захватила семья Хиираги, сформировавшая Имперскую Демоническую армию, которая защищает людей и бьет вампиров зачарованным оружием. Свой путь Юитиро ясен — готовиться к службе, мстить за погибшую родню. Прямого и порывистого парня ждет немало сюрпризов и неожиданностей, но в таком поганом мире лучше надеяться на свой дар и свой меч, чем на волю судьбы и благосклонность правителей!
description.pt-br: Um dia, um vírus misterioso apareceu na Terra e matou todos os humanos infectados com mais de 13 anos. Ao mesmo tempo, vampiros emergiram dos recantos sombrios do mundo e escravizaram a humanidade. Entra Hyakuya Yuuichirou, um menino que, junto com o resto das crianças de seu orfanato, é tratado como gado pelos vampiros. Mesmo em cativeiro, Yuuichirou sonha grande. Ele sonha em matar vampiros. Ele sonha em matar todos eles.

title.en: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo, Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu

altTitles.ja: 生まれた直後に捨てられたけど、前世が大賢者だったので余裕で生きてます

altTitles.en: Since My Previous Life was a Wise Man, I can Afford to Live.

description.en:
Born to excellent parents, Reus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking!

Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!
description.ja:
見た目は赤ちゃん、だけど中身は大賢者!?

世界を変えた最強の魔法使い・大賢者アリストテレウスがその生涯を閉じた…。
だが大賢者アリストテレウスは、死んだ後に転生の魔道具を使い、転生することに成功したのだった。
転生した先は、何百、何千年経ったのかも分からない後の世界の魔法名門家の赤子。
恵まれた人生を歩むはずが、内に宿した規格外の魔力のせいか勘違いされ、生まれた直後に捨てられてしまう…!?
しかし大賢者の能力と記憶を持つ赤子は、聖竜杖リントヴルムをお供に余裕で生き抜くのだった…!!

description.en: The story begins when Azuma Akari, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gangreve, the leader of a mercenary group. Akari joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Akari connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Akari is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Akari does not yet know that he will become a hero.
description.ja: 料理人志望の青年・東朱里が異世界にトリップしたところから物語は始まる。朱里を拾ったのは、傭兵団の団長、ガングレイブ。雑用として傭兵団に身を寄せる朱里は、徐々に料理の腕を振るうことで自らの存在価値を高めていく。傭兵団の各隊長たちは一癖も二癖もある人物揃いだったが、朱里は料理を通じて彼らと心を通じ合わせていった。傭兵団の食事事情を改善し、時に発明を手伝ったりと少しずつ、朱里は傭兵団の仲間たちに認められていくのだった。しかし、朱里はまだ知らない。自分自身が英雄として語られる存在になることを…。

title.en: Sesesese! ~Mezase Hatsu H! Doutei Joshi no Tokimeki Daisakusen~

altTitles.ja: せせせせ！～目指せ初H！童貞女子のときめき大作戦～

altTitles.ja-ro: Sesesese! ～Mezase Hatsu H! Doutei Joshi no Tokimeki Daisakusen～

altTitles.en: Sesesese! ~Aiming For My First Time! A Virgin Girl's Heart-Pounding Grand Strategy~

description.en: A high-energy sexually-charged comedy! Nagara Ayano, who has transformed from a virgin college student into a female version of his middle school self, blindly rushes in headfirst to try and achieve his first sexual experience, but things aren't going as smoothly as he'd hope...!

Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival… as the female lead?!

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".

title.en: Kimi ga Shinu Made Koi wo Shitai

altTitles.ja: きみが死ぬまで恋をしたい

altTitles.en: I Want to Love You Till Your Dying Day
My Wish Is To Fall In Love Until You Die

altTitles.pl: Pragnę Cię kochać aż do Twej śmierci

altTitles.uk: Хочу кохати, допоки ти не вмерла

altTitles.id: Keinginanku Adalah Jatuh Cinta Sampai Kamu Mati

altTitles.th: เพียงได้รักตราบสิ้นลมหายใจ

altTitles.en: I want to love you until you die

description.en:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residents—girls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommate’s death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanage’s halls that Mimi is their secret weapon—an immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheena’s new roommate, Sheena’s world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it… 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.
description.uk:
Десь на далекому закуточку світу між високих гір є одна дитяча школа-інтернат. Тут дітей ще з малого віку виховують, як магічно-військову зброю та гонять на війну заради країни. Будь-кого можуть відправили на поле бою в будь-який момент, а шанси вижити навіть у старанного учня – мізерні. Жорстока буденність, у якій немає місця для співчуття до загиблих товаришів.

Шіна – звичайна чотирнадцятирічна учениця цієї школи, серцю якої важко миритися з такою буденністю. Однієї ночі, вона зустріла в холі скривавлену дівчинку, яка щойно повернулася з бою – Мімі. Здавалося б, вони несумісні: Шіна не зносить тягаря оточуючої реальності та прагне мирного життя, а Мімі йде на війну з радісною посмішкою та повертається в крові подоланих ворогів. Проте разом проведений час та щире бажання зрозуміти один одного змогли навіки переплести їх долі, які тепер розлучить лиш смерть.

Це історія двох дівчат між смертю та коханням, які знайшли в цьому світі свою маленьку невинну мрію.

description.en:
I thought I could keep moving forward, but in an unexpected instant, I’ve lost myself in the gaps of this vast universe. Where have I seen this, this landscape that doesn’t exist? Right over there, in a time that will never come to pass. Welcome to the world of panpanya.    The 22 chapters of Makura Uo, which include stories like Ame no Hi (Rainy Day) and Gomi no Sakebigoe (The Cries of Trash), were either serialized in the special web edition of Hakusensha’s Rakuen Le Paradis magazine or published as doujinshi. Included are entries from panpanya’s diary as well as annotations from the author herself.    

(Source: AniList)
description.ru: Странные будни странной девочки в странном городе, полном странных созданий.

altTitles.en: The Daily Life of a Single 29-Year-Old Adventurer

description.en:
This story is about Shinonome Hajime, an adventurer of Silver Range. He's dedicated to fulfilling missions from the guild. One day when completing a quest for monster meat, he finds a strange girl named Lily in a dungeon who's far more trouble than she's worth. Saving the girl from certain death, her story reminds him of his similar past and he takes her under his care.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Official Comic Twitter](https://twitter.com/29sai_dokushin)

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

altTitles.th: เบย์เบลด เบิร์ส

altTitles.ja: ベイブレードバースト

description.en:
Latest reboot of the Beyblade franchise.  
  
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:

- Indonesian release by Elex Media

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件: クレイマン Revenge

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Clayman's Revenge

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Месть Клеймана

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسد فيه كسلايم: انتقام كلايمان

altTitles.tr: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman'in İntikamı

altTitles.uk: Про моє переродження в слиз: Помста Клеймана

description.en: Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?
description.ja: ワルプルギスに響き渡った断末魔。道化の夢は一度は尽きたかと思われた。しかし運命のイタズラか、世界の選択か、死んだはずのクレイマンは復活し、再び暗躍を始め･･･る？
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff es una historia alternativa que sucede luego de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera.

Historia alternativa que continua despues de los eventos del Volumen 6 de la Novela Ligera. - El Walpurgis habia terminado con el grito de su muerte. Parecia que el sueño del arlequin habia llegado a su fin. Sin embargo, ya sea por una broma del destino o una decisión del mundo, Clayman quien supuestamente murio, ha resucitado una vez mas. ¿Es el comienzo de una nueva era oscura...?

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Striving for the Luxury Liner!! Get that Rich Isekai Life with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

A young girl named Yuki, living in a small town, continued studying art with the goal of becoming an artist in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.

altTitles.ja: ラディア〜神殺しの私が神の恋人!?〜

description.es-la:
La búsqueda de venganza de Radia contra su traicionera amiga da un giro inesperado cuando Julius, un hombre misteriosamente poderoso, la salva de una experiencia cercana a la muerte.
¿El giro? Julius es un fantasma, visible solo para Radia.
ㅤ
Cuando se convierte en su compañero constante, Radia se ve envuelta en una red de contratiempos sobrenaturales que revelan cuán poderoso es realmente Julius.
Y aunque ni siquiera Julius conoce su verdadera identidad todavía, su casi omnipotencia podría ser la clave para que Radia se vengue.
Sin embargo, este poder también podría ocultar un peligro acechante que amenaza con reconfigurar su búsqueda de formas inesperadas y peligrosas...

title.en: GIRLS und PANZER der FILM Variante

altTitles.en: ガールズ&パンツァー 劇場版Variante

description.en: Girls und Panzer der Film Variante recreates Girls und Panzer der Film as a manga beginning at the same point, during the exhibition match commemorating Ooarai Girls High School’s victory in the 63rd Sensha-do tournament

The world experienced a cataclysm and monsters are now roaming the Earth. Born out of a necessity to subjugate these monsters, this new era saw the rise of a new profession. Monster Trainers – individuals who conquer, cultivate, and train these monsters. Thus begins the story of Gao Peng. An ambitious young man with dreams of his own, who gets launched right into the golden age of monster cultivation. Gao Peng: “Even if it’s a loach, I’ll be able to evolve it into a dragon that can soar to the heavens!”

A mystery murder case shatters Lan Zhiqing's serene and blissful life into pieces. The past she has long forgotten returns in the form of a nightmarish case, encroaching ever the closer... Shocked, Lan Zhiqing discovers that the most dangerous existence may just be the person she shares a bed with.

title.en: Kabeyaku Nado Fuyou to Tsuihousareta S-kyuu Boukensha, <Dorei Kaihou> Skill wo Kushi shite Shijou Saikyou no Kunizukuri

altTitles.ja: 壁役など不要と追放されたＳ級冒険者、≪奴隷解放≫スキルを駆使して史上最強の国造り

altTitles.en: An S-class Adventurer, Banished as the Tank of the Party, Uses His "Slave Release" Skill to Build the Strongest Country in History!

altTitles.pt-br: Um aventureiro classe-S que foi banido como tank da party, usa suas habilidades de “Libertação dos Escrav*s” para construir a nação mais forte da história.

description.en:
Alex, a holy knight, is suddenly expelled from his adventurers' party.

He tries to live a comfortable life by accepting a quest to cultivate a remote area, but suddenly he is given the extra skill "Slave Release"...?

Summon beautiful girl slaves and cultivate a demon territory overrun with demons! A slow life of harem in a fantasy world is about to begin!
description.ja:
冒険者パーティーから突如追放された聖騎士・アレックス。

僻地の開拓クエストを受けて、悠々自適の生活を送ろうとするが突然エクストラスキル≪奴隷解放≫を授かって―!?

美少女奴隷を召喚して、魔物が跋扈する魔族領を開拓しろ! 異世界ハーレムスローライフ開幕!

title.en: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Don't Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...

description.en: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

title.en: Reincarnated as the Lazy and Villainous Noble, I Broke the Scenario and Became the Most Formidable With Extraordinary Magic

altTitles.ja: 怠惰な悪辱貴族に転生した俺、シナリオをぶっ壊したら規格外の魔力で最凶になった

altTitles.ja-ro: Taidana Akuhazukashime Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowashitara Kikaku Gai No Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta

description.en:
I've been reincarnated as the villainous noble Weiss from my favorite academy game, and the fate that awaits me is nothing but the worst possible ruin, with no salvation.

I absolutely have to avoid that at all costs!

Then the only way out is to gain overwhelming power that even surpasses the game's protagonist and become the strongest!
description.ja:
大好きな学園ゲームに登場する悪役貴族・ヴァイスに転生してしまった、やがてこの身に待ち受けるのは、救いなしの最悪な破滅エンド。

それだけはなんとしてでも回避したい！

だったらこのゲームの主人公すら遠く及ばない、圧倒的な力を身につけて最強になるしかない！

最凶成り上がり異世界学園ファンタジーコミカライズ!
description.pt-br:
Eu reencarnei como *Weiss*, o nobre que é um vilãozinho secundário do meu jogo favorito, e que está destinado a  própria ruína e morte.

Eu definitivamente preciso evitar isso de qualquer jeito!

Então, o que me sobra é conseguir um poder tão apelão que nem mesmo o protagonista ousará me enfrentar.
